hymn.title: Not Too Fast, Not Too Slow

layout.singingstanza: Not too fast, not too slow, God turns the earth. One turn gives a day and night: So pre -- cise -- ly right. Day, night, God turns the earth. God turns our earth So pre -- cise -- ly right. Day, night, God turns the earth. God turns our earth So pre -- cise -- ly right.
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2012 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: Not too fast, not too slow, God turns the earth. One turn gives a day and night: So precisely right. Day, night, God turns the earth. God turns our earth So precisely right. Day, night, God turns the earth. God turns our earth So precisely right.

Not too hot, not too cold, God placed the earth: Not too close and not too far, Exactly where we are. Not too Hot or too cold; God placed our earth Exactly where we are. Not too Hot or too cold; God placed our earth Exactly where we are.
Parts 1 to 3 can be sung together.
